bind.calculate: if(selected( /data/c82_person/danger_signs/profile_baby_fast_breathing , 'yes') or selected( /data/c82_person/danger_signs/profile_chest_indrawing , 'yes') or selected( /data/c82_person/danger_signs/profile_umblical_pus_or_redness , 'yes') or selected( /data/c82_person/danger_signs/profile_yellow_palms_feet , 'yes') or selected( /data/c82_person/danger_signs/profile_pustules_10_or_big , 'yes') or selected( /data/c82_person/danger_signs/profile_no_movement , 'yes') or selected( /data/c82_person/danger_signs/profile_fever_convulsion , 'yes') or selected( /data/c82_person/danger_signs/profile_refuse_breastfeeding , 'yes') or selected( /data/c82_person/danger_signs/profile_vomits_everything , 'yes'), 'yes', 'no')
